names.pinyin: fu ling tang jia jian er hao

actions: With Ma Huang, dispels Wind-Cold from the Exterior.
Disperses deep Cold, warms the channels, unblocks the channels and vessels and alleviates pain.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, expels Wind and alleviates pain.
Nourishes the Blood, astringes Yin, adjusts the Ying and Wei, calms Liver Yang and Liver Wind and alleviates pain.
Induces sweating, releases the Exterior, promotes urination, reduces edema and warms and disperses Cold pathogens.
Moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.

syndromes: Wind-Cold-Damp Bi With Cold and Damp Predominant

symptoms: Fixed pain with a feeling of heaviness
Pain alleviated by warmth and aggravated by Cold
The joints cannot be flexed or extended
Painful area often feels cold to the touch
Pain worse at night and better during the day
Pain changes over days or weeks
Maybe chills with a slight fever
Numbness and heaviness of the extremities
Stiffness or numbness of the muscles or skin
Pain worse on cloudy or rainy days
Pain is alleviated by pressure and warmth
Pain lingers and is recalcitrant to treatment
Worse during cloudy or wet weather
Superficial and tight or Wiry and tight - maybe slow
manifestations.tongueCoat: Thin and white or Greasy and white

notes: This formula is especially effective for the upper body and neck.
